main.summary: Of the total 10 local units in Achham, Bannigadhi and Mellekh rural municipalities have very few women seeking services, inquiring about budget allocation for the development of women and children, and coming forward with complaints.

main.title: We’re Here We're Queer
main.summary: Meghna Lama has walked the runway for dozens of fashion shows—but never as an opener. That changed this week. Lama, who was crowned Miss Pink 2010, along with three other models from the LGBTIQ community, opened ‘Style Invasion’ show by stylist Sonya Gurung. full story »

main.title: Girl students receive bicycles in Rautahat

main.summary: The Department of Money Laundering Investigation has launched joint or parallel investigations with police on money laundering cases as part of effort to improve coordination among the law enforcement agencies ahead of mutual evaluation of Nepal’s compliance to standards on anti-money laundering and terrorist financing due for 2020. full story »

main.title: Here are five classic Nepali songs that refuse to die
main.summary: Living in a house with three different generations—a 93-year-old grandmother, a 53-year-old father and 27-year-old me—I grew up listening to old Nepali songs. These classics are not just favourites in my household but they also continue to resound across the nation, played on laptops and bluetooth speakers through Youtube, and are still in rotation on the radio. full story »

national.summary: When the government signed a deal with Free Madhes campaigner CK Raut at the City Hall on Friday, most of the leaders of the ruling communist party were in the dark about the development.

national.title: Court releases six cops on bail in Nirmala rape and murder case
national.summary: ​​​​​​​The Kanchanpur District Court on Thursday ordered bail release of six police officials who were arrested on charge of evidence tampering and torturing an innocent man to extract false confession in connection to the rape and murder case of 13-year-old Nirmala Pant.
